statements: UPDATE in_game_events SET event_name = 'Level Up', event_description = 'Player leveled up to 10' WHERE event_id = 1;
UPDATE in_game_events SET event_description = 'New quest available' WHERE event_type = 'Quest';
UPDATE in_game_events SET event_name = 'New Event Name', event_description = 'Updated Description', event_date = '2022-12-31' WHERE event_id = 1;
UPDATE in_game_events SET event_type = 'Special Event', event_description = 'Exciting Event Coming Up!', event_name = 'Festive Event' WHERE event_id = 3;
UPDATE Events SET event_name = 'New Event Name', event_date = '2022-12-31' WHERE event_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE Quests SET quest_difficulty = 2, quest_description = 'Updated Quest Description' WHERE quest_id = 'aabbccdd-1234-5678-9012-abcdef123456';

UPDATE Events SET event_name = 'Annual Conference', event_description = 'A conference showcasing the latest trends in technology.', event_date = '2022-09-15' WHERE event_id = 1;
UPDATE Quests SET quest_description = 'Navigate through a mysterious forest to find the hidden treasure.', quest_difficulty = 5, quest_name = 'The Enchanted Forest' WHERE quest_id = 3;

UPDATE Players SET player_level = player_level + 1, player_experience = player_experience + 100 WHERE player_id = 5;
